entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `info` TEXT NOT NULL, `is_done` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_tasks_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_tasks_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)
